seo: Node-RED,任意文件读取漏洞,CVE-2021-3223,路径遍历漏洞
seo_en: Node-RED,Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability,CVE-2021-3223,Path Traversal Vulnerability
summary: 检测Node-RED-Dashboard版本低于2.26.2是否存在路径遍历漏洞（CVE-2021-3223），攻击者可能利用此漏洞读取服务器上的敏感文件，例如settings.js。
summary_en: Detect if Node-RED-Dashboard version lower than 2.26.2 has Path Traversal Vulnerability (CVE-2021-3223), which allows attackers to read sensitive files such as settings.js.
